TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised when `DataBind` is called on the item during a call to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

Docs.param: A that is the source of the event.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the specified object as the source of the event.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs> using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> that represents a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.PathSeparator>, and how to pass the event arguments to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A> method. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> class.
